snippet.title: Star Wars: Puzzle Droids™ - Official Game Trailer
snippet.description:
Explore the galaxy with your favorite droids to experience the Star Wars™ saga like never before in a brand new match-3 adventure.
Tap into BB-8’s memories for an epic retelling from the unique perspective of the droids! The journey will feature familiar scenes and previously untold moments alongside exciting gameplay and interactive puzzle boards. You’ll even meet characters such as Rey, Finn, and Poe Dameron and take on the First Order.
Are you ready to embark on the ultimate Star Wars puzzle adventure?
Available to download & PLAY NOW on the App Store, Google Play and Amazon.
